front.title: •4-LOM With Concussion Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Permanent weapon is •4-LOM's Concussion Rifle (may target a character for free; target is power -1 until end of turn).  Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile to draw top card from Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Accomplished thief and information broker. Modified by Jabba to be an effective bounty hunter. The Hutt often teams 4-LOM with other hired killers.

combo: 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle + Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter Two battle destinies.
